name: Lithium Response
description: People share. Get in on the conversation.

configuration.name: Allow Select Fields parameter
configuration.description: Enables use of global fields query parameter to filter response to only specified fields. This will override any existing vendor functionality on the connector

configuration.name: Re Authenticate Every
configuration.description: Reauthenticate and Check Instance every 5 mins

configuration.name: baseUrl
configuration.description: Your response app base url (i.e. my.response.lithium.com)

configuration.name: Company Key
configuration.description: Company Key to be used for the Analytics APIs. If not supplied, some APIs will not work

configuration.name: Disposition Ids
configuration.description: Comma seperated Disposition Ids to be used for the Analytics APIs.

configuration.name: Filter null values from the response
configuration.description: Used to enable/disable filtering of null values from the responses.

configuration.name: Default select fields
configuration.description: Generic map used to specify default fields for bulk download and GET /all requests. Each key should be the canonical objectName and values may be specified as a comma-delimited string or a list of strings

configuration.name: Bulk Upload Restart
configuration.description: Can Recover From Bulk Server Restart

configuration.name: Event poller refresh interval
configuration.description: Set time interval for polling application (in minutes)

configuration.name: Event Poller Resources Configuration
configuration.description: Event Poller Resources Configuration. The configuration is defined via JSON, an example of which is as follows - { "contacts": { "url": "/hubs/helpdesk/contacts", “idField”: “user.id”, “datesConfiguration”: { "updatedDateField": "user.updated_at", "updatedDateFormat": "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssX", “createdDateField”: “user.created_at”, “createdDateFormat": "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssX" }, "pageSize": 10000 } }

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number. Defaults to 1 if not provided

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The page size. Defaults to 200 if not provided. Maximum of 5000

resources.description: Search for conversations for an author

parameters.name: where
parameters.description: The CEQL search expression. You can search by startEpochMillis and/or endEpochMillis. When searching, only 24hrs of data can be retrieved. i.e. startEpochMillis='1465135940924' and endEpochMillis='1465135940942'

resources.description: Batch Upload and Merge of Authors

parameters.name: where
parameters.description: The CEQL search expression. You can search by startEpochMillis and/or endEpochMillis. When searching, only 24hrs of data can be retrieved. i.e. startEpochMillis='1465135940924' and endEpochMillis='1465135940942'

parameters.name: where
parameters.description: The CEQL search expression. You can search by startEpochMillis and/or endEpochMillis. When searching, only 24hrs of data can be retrieved. i.e. startEpochMillis='1465135940924' and endEpochMillis='1465135940942'

parameters.name: where
parameters.description: The CEQL search expression. You can search by startEpochMillis and/or endEpochMillis. When searching, only 24hrs of data can be retrieved. i.e. startEpochMillis='1465135940924' and endEpochMillis='1465135940942'

resources.description: Add a note to a conversation

parameters.name: note
parameters.description: Note That needs to be added to the conversation

parameters.name: displayId
parameters.description: The conversation Display ID. This is a number and not a UUID
